(15.9 kg) .8' (0.2 m) .2' (0.1 m) 3.3' (1.0 m) 9.5' (2.9 m) 20' (6.1 m) 6' (1.8 m) 60' (18.3 m) 197 gr (12.8 gm) WF7I Tensile Strength Tip Bullet Taper Front Taper Body 2 Length Body Rear Taper Running Line 30 Ft Weight Weight This line offers a 40 ft water clear AquaLux® head and a super slick, supple running line on a supple coldwater single strand monofilament core for smooth casting and minimal coiling. A short front bullet taper and medium length back taper (based on RIO's Clouser line taper) propels large flies to stripers, bluefish and seatrout. Includes welded loop on the front end. The perfect saltwater intermediate line
textAfterTable: Fly Line Features: Weight forward intermediate sinking striped bass taper design (short bullet taper) propels large flies Powerflex® monofilament braided core Clear AquaLux® head Welded loop on front end Tropical I/I Saltwater Line - Powerflex® Core The Saltwater I/I line is a full intermediate [1.5-2.0 in/s (3.8-5.1 cm/s)] line with a green tint and a 9.5 ft clear tip. It is a great line for laid-up fish that are a little deeper in the water column or for keeping in touch with the fly in choppy water. Based on the Clouser taper and built on RIO's Powerflex core with a tropical coating, it is the perfect full intermediate line for fishing in warmer climes. Welded loops on both ends. Weight 30 Ft Weight Running Line Rear Taper Body Body 2 Length Front Taper Bullet Taper Tip Tensile Strength
